name: Alcotabs® Critical Cleaning Detergent Tablets
description:
Alcotabs® Critical Cleaning Detergent Tablets is an effervescent detergent tablet for lab pipette cleaning. Maximum cleaning in siphon pipette washers to clean pipettes and tubes. Slow release bubble action and free rinsing produce reliable results and no interfering residues. USDA authorized. pH 6.5


Special slow release tablet formulation for pipette cleaning. Maximum cleaning performance from your siphon pipette washers
Concentrated to save you money
Biodegradable and readily disposable
Free rinsing to give you reliable results and no interfering residues
Use to pass your cleaning validation tests for lab accreditation and plant inspection approval
